entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
